name: Ice Cream Blast – Rainbow Jump Carnival by Fun Free Kids Games
name_original: Ice Cream Blast – Rainbow Jump Carnival by Fun Free Kids Games
description:
HOT NEW APP DON'T MISS OUT!
Fun Cotton Candy Blast - Action packed adventure with every jump! Help the Cotton Candy Blast soar through the sky balancing on platforms reaching new heights and collecting bonus points along the way.

Sweet Fun For All! Personalize your cotton candy character with.....
- choice of favorite flavor
- hats for every occasion
- cool glasses
- stylish mustaches and eyebrows
- unique costumes and special colorful effects!



Check out the screenshots and see for yourself, you won't be disappointed!
